APPAREL TECHNICAL DESIGNER
Career Focus
Represent the Company's interest of universal and consistent fit aesthetics and proper construction of garments as well as standardizing product fit
and constructions specifications.
Qualifications
Proven success in writing specification sheets Experience in corresponding with contractors overseas
Knowledge of fitting Excellent ability for flat sketching
Pattern making and sewing Excellent administrative skills
Knowledge of textiles Proficient in English and Spanish
